Message:
There’s no way to turn
a witch back into a human...

...but the Church used that
and fooled my kind parents,
stealing all our belongings.

Realizing there was
nothing left they could
give the Church,
my parents instead
gave their lives...!

Did you really believe
there was a way...?
To turn me, a witch,
back into a human?

You two are idiots for
believing something like that...

My mom and dad were
such nice people...
but they’re idiots.

The Church thinks that
if a witch is involved,
they can do whatever
the heck they want.

If it’s a witch,
they can lie...and deceive...!
If so, then I’ll become a liar.

I won’t let myself be
some fool and get killed.

I’ll become the one
who fools...and I’ll survive...!

...If the Church hates
witches so much,
I wonder what they’d do
if me, a witch, took all
the money they stole and
gave it out to other witches.
Who’d be the fool then?

“Hey, Father. Yeah, you.
Wanna know of a way
to get an audience
with the Pope?”
